Interface IApiContext<T>

Namespace
DevInstance.BlazorToolkit.Http

DevInstance.BlazorToolkit.dll

Interface for API context operations.

public interface IApiContext<T>

Type Parameters

T

The type of the entity.

Methods

Parameters

id string

The ID of the entity.

Returns

The API context.

Sort(string, bool)

Sorts the entities by a key.

IApiContext<T> Sort(string key, bool isAsc)

Parameters

key string

The key to sort by.

isAsc bool

If true, sorts in ascending order; otherwise, sorts in descending order.

Returns

The API context.
